name: SELECT ... FROM ... WHERE alias.col LIKE '%xxx' (PeopleSoft)
description: Only the use of LIKE '%xxx' is checked
rationale:
In the where clause, if a LIKE statement is used and the clause starts with %, no index will be use.
This rule is a best practice on query construction to improve performances.
remediation: Validate the query by a DBA and test it in a real environment

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - SQL and Data Handling Performance
